text:
DSO dbd drivers (like sqlite3 on Windows) cannot access apr_dbd_mutex_lock() or
apr_dbd_mutex_unlock() because these functions are not exported.

Patch attached.
creator: Tom.Donovan@acm.org
Tom.Donovan@acm.org
text:
Created attachment 21106
dbd apr_dbd_mutex_lock()/unlock() external patch
Fixed in r594037. Thanks for the patch!
creator: bojan@rexursive.com
